mapper.select:
select
from PLAYER where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and IS_DELETED='N'

select
from PLAYER where IS_DELETED='N'
and USER_NAME = '${userName}'
and `NAME` = '${name}'

select count(*) from PLAYER where 1=1
and ( ID like '${searchValue}%' or USER_NAME like '${searchValue}%' or `NAME` like '${searchValue}%' )

GENERAL_KILL = #{generalKill,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GENERAL_DEAD = #{generalDead,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GENERAL_HEAD_SHOT = #{generalHeadShot,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GENERAL_KNIFE_KILL = #{generalKnifeKill,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GENERAL_CONTROL = #{generalControl,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GENERAL_REVENGE = #{generalRevenge,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GENERAL_WIN = #{generalWin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GENERAL_TOTAL = #{generalTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER},

FUN_GRENADE_KILL = #{funGrenadeKill,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FUN_DROP_KILL = #{funDropKill,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FUN_WEAPON_MOD = #{funWeaponMod,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FUN_DEAD = #{funDead,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TUTORIAL = #{tutorial,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROFILE = #{profile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ICON = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SELECTED_CHARACTERS = #{selectedCharacters,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACHIEVEMENT = #{achievement,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR},
TEAM_ID = #{teamId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GENERAL_GRENADE_KILL = #{generalGrenadeKill,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_NEW = #{isNew,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_VIP = #{isVip,jdbcType=INTEGER},
VIP_EXPERIENCE = #{vipExperience,jdbcType=INTEGER},
VIP_TO_EXPIRE = #{vipToExpire,jdbcType=BIGINT},
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOLD = #{gold,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SILVER = #{silver,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BRONZE = #{bronze,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TOTAL = #{total,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GENERAL_ASSIST = #{generalAssist,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WEEK_SCORE = #{weekScore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WEEK_KILL = #{weekKill,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WEEK_ASSIST = #{weekAssist,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WEEK_DEAD = #{weekDead,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WEEK_WIN = #{weekWin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WEEK_TOTAL = #{weekTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BLACK_WHITE = #{blackWhite,jdbcType=CHAR},
RUN_AWAY = #{runAway,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CHARACTERS = #{characters,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
GENERAL_LOSE = #{generalLose,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_XUNLEI = #{isXunlei,jdbcType=TINYINT},
GENERAL_HEALTH_NUM = #{generalHealthNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_CHECK = #{isCheck,jdbcType=BIT},
MAX_FIGHT_NUM = #{maxFightNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ACCOUNT_TYPE = #{accountType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
IS_CHEST = #{isChest,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SECOND_PASSWORD = #{secondPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HAS_SECOND_PASSWORD = #{hasSecondPassword,jdbcType=TINYINT},
APPLY_RESET_SPW_TIME = #{applyResetSpwTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REMAINS_TEAM_EXP = #{remainsTeamExp,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LAST_TEAM_EXP = #{lastTeamExp,jdbcType=INTEGER},

VIP_EXP_GIFT_LEVEL = #{vipExpGiftLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MATCH_WIN = #{matchWin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
